programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation; Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad is on edge as Carisi waits for a verdict in Maddie's kidnapping case; Benson tries to help the Flynn family pick up the pieces of their broken life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance; Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a school shooting that left three students dead and link the rifle used in the killings to a gun store serving as the headquarters of a white supremacist group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of rapes is linked to a speed-dating service, Benson goes under cover and discovers Mike Jergens (Dean Cain) is the assailant.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a runaway teenage girl is found badly beaten, doctors discover the beating killed her unborn child, and detectives begin to question the father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal beating of a 12-year-old boy uncovers a female suspect whose trial becomes about the rights of same-sex parents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the accused killer of a teen's mother is released due to lack of evidence, the youth exacts his own justice by killing the man.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess works an extra shift at the 13th District and gets caught in the middle of a drive-by attack on refugees; the team works together to track down the shooter and uncover the true motive behind the attack.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Returning from furlough, Torres goes under cover in a tense and high-stakes drug trafficking case.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater turns to an unlikely source of support when a string of jewelry store robberies shakes his confidence.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence teams up with ASA Chapman to take on an abduction case involving a teenager; the case hits close to home for Voight, leading him to take a personal interest in finding justice for the victim.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: An ongoing case hits close to home for Voight as Intelligence teams up with an SVU detective to track down a prolific offender.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton brings SVU detective Petrovic back into the fold to help with the investigation of a tender-age kidnapping.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Torres' personal involvement with an informant jeopardizes his safety and threatens to expose an undercover operation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The members of Firehouse 51 struggle to cope when one of their own dies in a fire; as Lts. Casey and Severide blame each other for the tragedy, Casey also secretly goes through a separation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide hides his serious shoulder injury as he tries to rescue a construction worker from a collapsed building; two teens are trapped in a vehicle.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey must decide whether to turn in a cop's son who paralyzed a teen in a drunken-driving accident; Severide learns he has a fractured vertebra; Mills is torn between his mother and the job.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Chief Boden faces accusations that he abandoned a homeless man to die in a warehouse fire; Severide helps an elderly woman; Detective Voight tries to convince Casey not to testify against his son; Shay has to face her ex during a call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey must face the consequences of confronting Detective Voight; Dawson faces disciplinary action; Severide reaches out to an old friend about his injury.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson receives help from a girl she saved; Detective Voight is determined to get Casey to retract his statement.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
programme.desc: With the price on his head ever increasing, legendary hit man John Wick takes his fight against the High Table global as he seeks out the most powerful players in the underworld, from New York to Paris to Japan to Berlin.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
programme.desc: With the price on his head ever increasing, legendary hit man John Wick takes his fight against the High Table global as he seeks out the most powerful players in the underworld, from New York to Paris to Japan to Berlin.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tip leads Benson and Cragen to the body of a 7-year-old boy, missing since 1980, and the detectives think the new information was a ploy to help the suspected killer, on death row for another murder, delay his execution.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, a psychic (guest star Martin Short) is brought into the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 9-year-old girl calls for help, claiming to be held hostage in a strange room for four days, many believe it is a prank, but Detective Benson feels otherwise.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a high-school student is brutally assaulted, detectives interview a suspect who becomes enraged and attacks Detective Tutuola.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty is being tortured by her captors in Vietnam; Eric and Nell find a clue to her whereabouts; the team organizes a rescue mission.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS joins Hetty's team from the Vietnam War in a dangerous rescue mission to save Hetty from her captors in Vietnam; Mosley calls in Nell's sister to assist the team in Los Angeles with processing evidence connected to Hetty's time in Vietnam.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam pull Granger's daughter, former spy Jennifer Kim, from witness protection to help the team locate a spy who has obtained an arsenal of bomb materials.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The dismembered body of a woman is found in a junkyard, and detectives must determine who killed her and who attempted to harvest organs from her corpse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Fin deals with colleagues who accuse his son of murder, he learns a secret that reveals more about his family's relationship with Darius.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial pedophile murders members of a family and kidnaps the two younger children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman believes her young son was molested by her husband; an online pedophile site is investigated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unstable woman stops taking medication and mows down 10 people with her car; a former rock star wages an anti-psychiatric-drug campaign.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the disappearance of two high-school students from a museum field-trip; Stabler meets his new partner.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) are unable to build a case against a rape suspect until a new witness (Leslie Caron) steps forward.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an assailant rapes his victim twice, detectives Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) link the case to other victims of multiple rapes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Novak calls upon detective Benson, still under cover in Oregon, to present evidence that will strengthen the case against a brutal rapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A car accident involving two foster children leads detectives Beck and Stabler to the foster parents and questionable medical practices involving a controversial "rebirthing" therapy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in Central Park, and when the medical examiner can find no apparent cause of death, Stabler starts investigating the victim's husband (Chris Sarandon) and his friends.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 15-year-old with a sexually transmitted disease says he caught it from his teacher (Melissa Joan Hart); Benson and Stabler uncover dark secrets while searching into the pair's lives.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 New Year's Day Premier League meeting between Tottenham and Chelsea at White Hart Lane, featuring eight goals in total, including two for in-form Harry Kane.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We relive this six-goal classic between Manchester United and Manchester City from the 2014/15 season. Sergio Aguero got the visitors off to a flying start.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: West Ham and Arsenal locked horns in the Premier League at Upton Park. This London derby took on added significance with both clubs in the hunt for a Champions League spot.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this Boxing Day clash between Bournemouth and West Ham. Marko Arnautovic and Callum Wilson were among the scorers in this six-goal thriller.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Mikel Arteta's Arsenal at St. James' Park. The Magpies are winless in their last five league games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Arne Slot's Liverpool face Unai Emery's Aston Villa at Anfield. Liverpool have won five of their last six home games against the Villans.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Leicester City welcome Enzo Maresca's Chelsea to King Power Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action as Everton face table toppers Liverpool in the final league Merseyside derby at Goodison Park. The Toffees claimed a 2-0 win in this fixture last season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Ange Postecoglou's out-of-form Tottenham travel to face bottom side Southampton at St Mary's Stadium. The Saints have won just one of their last 28 Premier League games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Pep Guardiola's struggling Manchester City travel to the West Midlands to face an Aston Villa side who beat them 1-0 at Villa Park last season.
